description:
Independent Study Modules (ISMs) are for students with the requisite background to work closely with an instructor on a well-defined project in the respective specialization areas. Students will be exposed to individual-based
research and report-writing while tackling a business issue under the guidance of the instructor. Students, will do an in-depth structured study/project
ranging from detail literature survey on a given topic to conducting evaluation exercises on the efficacies of given business practice, economic policy or strategy.
title: Independent Study in Business Economics
prerequisite: Varies according to the subject matter covered.
